properties.entry: SELECT TEAM_NO, TEAM_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO) AS MATCH_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO AND SCORE > 0) AS WIN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO AND SCORE <= 0) AS LOSE, (SELECT ROUND(CAST((SUM(SCORE) / COUNT(*)) AS NUMERIC), 3) FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO) AS WIN_RATE, (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONSEQUENCE, ', ') FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO) AS CONSEQUENCE, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(BATTING_AVERAGE), 3) FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO) AS BATTING_AVERAGE, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(ERA), 2) FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO) AS ERA, (SELECT STRING_AGG(RECENT_MATCH, ', ') FROM MATCH WHERE TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO) AS RECENT_MATCH FROM TEAMS T ORDER BY WIN DESC, WIN_RATE DESC
